products.title: T-shirt Staff dragon oversize
products.description:
T-shirt from Staff in the style of tai dai with oversize fit will give a feeling of maximum comfort and complement any of your bows.

Material:
- high-quality European 100% cotton

Details and cut:
- oversize cut type,
- round neckline,
- high-quality print on the chest,
- tag with the Staff brand logo sewn into the side seam

Color:
- black / brown.

Care:
- washing in the usual mode at a temperature not exceeding 30 ° C, without spinning,
- bleaching is prohibited,
- drying in a suspended state, without the use of artificial drying. >
In the photo:
- model height - 175 cm,
- model weight - 71 kg,
- size of items - M.
